section.p: Immediately after launch Dialog Nibelung StudDB will display the login window awaiting user authentification.

To log in:
Choose your name in the drop down list.
Enter your password.
Press OÐš button or Enter on your keyboard.
If you made a mistake while entering your password, you will be given another attempt.
If you click on Change password the software will prompt you for your old and new passwords (see ). It is not possible to change the password without entering the old one.
If your keyboard is in CapsLock an indicator to that effect will appear in the window.
Press the Cancel button or Esc on your keyboart to abort login and quit Dialog Nibelung StudDB.
